feed.title: OctoBot: Free open source trading robot
feed.subtitle: OctoBot is an open source cryptocurrency trading robot designed to be easy to use and infinitely customizable.

entry.title: OKEx is now integrated with OctoBot

link.title: OKEx is now integrated with OctoBot

entry.content: The OKEx exchange is announcing that it has integrated with OctoBot for professional trading and data analysis.
entry.summary: The OKEx exchange is announcing that it has integrated with OctoBot for professional trading and data analysis.

entry.title: OctoBot on Okteto Community Call
entry.content: Watch the July 2021 Okteto Community Call featuring the OctoBot team presenting OctoBot from a developer standpoint and discussing Okteto new preview environments.
entry.summary: Watch the July 2021 Okteto Community Call featuring the OctoBot team presenting OctoBot from a developer standpoint and discussing Okteto new preview environments.

entry.title: Preview OctoBot evolutions on Okteto
entry.content: Thanks to Okteto, pull requests on OctoBot can be deployed in preview environment to quickly and easily see improvements and new features added by every contributor.
entry.summary: Thanks to Okteto, pull requests on OctoBot can be deployed in preview environment to quickly and easily see improvements and new features added by every contributor.
